message.original: ポーンとの契約を果たすため ポーン郷へ赴き試練に挑む
message.translation: In order to acquire a pawn, head to the Pawn Settlement and complete the challenge

message.original: リム転移でテル村に行き、アルフレドから話を聞く
message.translation: Go to the village of Tel using the Portcrystal and hear what Alfred has to say

message.original: エリア情報とその内容を確認する
message.translation: Check the area information with Alfred

message.original: 狩人の抜け穴を通りポーン郷へ向かう
message.translation: Go through the Hunters' Secret Passage and head to the Pawn Settlement

message.original: ポーン郷で情報収集する
message.translation: Get information in the Pawn Settlement

message.original: ポーン郷の＜拠点の礎＞を解放しマイ拠点登録する
message.translation: Register and set the Pawn Cathedral Portcrystal
